achievementInfo.octopus: As a party, catch 150 or more octopodes. (18.75 each)
achievementInfo.shark: As a party, catch 200 or more sharks. (25 each)
achievementInfo.jellyfish: As a party, catch 150 or more jellyfish. (18.75 each)
achievementInfo.seadragon: As a party, catch 100 or more seahorses. (12.5 each)
achievementInfo.balloon: As a party, catch 250 or more fugu. (31.25 each)
achievementInfo.crab: As a party, catch 250 or more crabs. (31.25 each)
achievementInfo.manta: As an individual, catch 25 or more mantas.
